#include <stdint.h>

#if !defined(__SOFT_FP__) && defined(__ARM_FP)
  #warning "FPU is not initialized, but the project is compiling for an FPU. Please initialize the FPU before use."
#endif

int main(void)
{
		uint32_t *pClkCtrlReg =   (uint32_t *) 0x40023830; //0x4002 3800 + 0x30
		//pg 265
		uint32_t *pPortDModeReg = (uint32_t *) 0x40020C00; //0x4002 0C00 + 0x00
		//pg 281
		uint32_t *pPortDOutReg =  (uint32_t *) 0x40020C14; //0x4002 0C00 + 0x14

		//1. enable the clock for GPOID peripheral in the AHB1ENR (SET the 3rd bit position)
		*pClkCtrlReg |= ( 1 << 3);

		//2. configure the mode of the IO pin as output
		//a. clear the 24th and 25th bit positions (CLEAR)
		*pPortDModeReg &= ~( 3 << 24);  // just to reset the bit
		//b. make 24th bit position as 1 (SET)
		*pPortDModeReg |= ( 1 << 24);

		//3.SET 12th bit of the output data register to make I/O pin-12 as HIGH
		*pPortDOutReg |= ( 1 << 12);



			/* Introducing a delay
		//introduce small human observable delay
		//This loop executes for 10K times
		//for(uint32_t i=0 ; i < 1000000 ; i++ );

		//Tun OFF the LED
		*pPortDOutReg |= ( 0 << 12);
		*pPortDOutReg &= ~( 1 << 12);

		//introduce small human observable delay
		//This loop executes for 10K times
		//for(uint32_t i=0 ; i < 1000000 ; i++ );

*/
	for(;;);
}
